Compare vectors

```{r}
linkedin <- c(16,9,13,5,2,17,14)
facebook <- c(17,9,16,5,2,13,14)

linkedin>15

facebook <= 5

linkedin> facebook

```

compare matrices

```{r}
views <- matrix(c(linkedin, facebook), nrow=2, byrow = TRUE)
views
views ==13
views <= 14
```

The if statement

```{r}
medium <- "Linkedin"
num_views <- 14

if(medium == "Linkedin"){
  print("Showing Linkedin information")
}

 
```

```{r}
result <- ""
number <- 6

if(number < 10){
  if(number < 5){
    result <- "extra small"
  }
  else {
    result <- "small"
  }
}else if(number<100){
  result <- "medium"
}else{
  result <- "large"
}

print(result)
```

```{r}

  print("slow down! ")
  print(speed)
  speed <- speed -7
}
```
